items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: easyocr-js is a lightweight wrapper for EasyOCR that enables seamless text recognition in JavaScript. It simplifies integration with EasyOCR's Python backend, allowing developers to perform OCR tasks effortlessly in JS environments.
